item.description: I am a Vienna-based Backend Developer from Austria with a background in data and knowledge engineering. Professionally I am currently working in the R&D team of Anexia, mainly using Golang and Python to get things done in the area of server virtualization . My extra-professional interests include tinkering with MongoDB, reversing communication protocols and gardening.
